transcript_text: Customer: Hello. Executive: Good evening Faisal ji. Pankaj from IndiaMART head office. Your account manager Vinit told me you marked not satisfied on feedback. What was the issue? Customer: Actually I was busy. Someone else gave feedback. Executive: Okay so it was a mistake? Customer: Yes, mistakenly I clicked not satisfied. There is no real issue. Executive: No problem sir, I will close this complaint. You will receive an email, please mark as satisfied there. Customer: Okay sir, thank you. Executive: Thank you for your time sir.
